name: Maze Game of Death
description:
Think you have a good sense of direction? Put it to the test in this survival maze!

Your mission is simple: navigate the labyrinth, avoid the traps, and escape the maze.

Game Features:

  • Single-Player

  • In-Game Achievements

  • DEATH

--------------------------------------

This is my first game release! My goal with this project was to produce a game, call it complete, and release it into the wild to be enjoyed by my fellow gamers.

I welcome your feedback, leave a comment and tell me about your experience!
